definition[0]: a man who has a rank in the aristocracy, especially in Britain, or his title
definition[1]: a man in medieval Europe who was very powerful and owned a lot of land
definition[2]: a title of God or Jesus Christ, used when praying
example[2]: Thank you, Lord, for your blessings.
definition[3]: God or Jesus Christ, used when talking about God
example[3]: The Lord helps and guides us.
definition[4]: the title of someone who has a particular type of official job in Britain
